title: Blake Edwards: A Love Story in 24 Frames
overview: While known for cinema classics such as Breakfast at Tiffanyâ€™s, Days of Wine and Roses and the Pink Panther series, the iconic director, screenwriter and producer Blake Edwards was also a sculptor and painter, loving husband and devoted father.
